page.title: 02WORLD WIDE CHURCH OF GOD
page.content: We are not Jews although we keep the Sabbath and Holy Days mentioned in the Old Testament.Our Church began in 31A.D.on the day of Pentacost.We keep all the Laws that God commanded in the Old Testament,including Tithing and not eating unclean foods. Friday sunset to Saturday sunset is the Sabbath as it was for Jesus Christ.The Holy days; after the Passover and foot ceremony,are seven days unleavened bread(the first and last days no one works),Pentacost,Day of Trumpets,Atonement and the Feast of Tabernacles.Then we must go away and stay in caravans or hotels and attend conferences.This is usually in September or October.The days are based on the Hebrew Calendar,not the Julian Calendar used today.
